full_summary:
===============

## Government Tender Announcement

**Parking Lot Replacement Project - Innisfail, Alberta**

Solicitation Number: M5000-22-5575/A

### Description of Tender

This tender is for the replacement of parking lots at the Innisfail detachment of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police. The project involves:

1.  Pulverizing and re-grading staff and visitor parking areas, replacing existing asphalt.
2.  Removing existing parking bollards and installing new ones adjacent to garage bays.
3.  Refinishing remaining parking bollards to match existing ones.
4.  Line painting for stalls and handicap identifiers.
5.  Converting a portion of the parking area to gravel, complete with geotextile underlay.
6.  Retaining and compensating a Geotechnical Engineer to verify requirements and inspect/accept work by the Departmental Representative.

### Timeline

The successful bidder is expected to complete the work by December 2, 2024.

### Procurement Process

This is Phase One of a two-phase competition. Phase One will pre-qualify bidders based on mandatory requirements. Phase Two will invite pre-qualified bidders to submit financial bids for the project. Pre-qualified bidders will be valid for 60 days or until the contract is awarded in Phase Two, whichever comes first.

### Additional Requirements

*   The project involves a security requirement.
*   The Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada applies to this project.
*   Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
*   Documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada.
*   Indigenous Procurement: eligibility criteria and registration for the Indigenous Business Directory are available at [www.canada.ca](http://www.canada.ca).
*   Canada is not responsible for the accuracy of information found on websites of third parties.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Sandra E. Robinson at:

*   Email: <sandra.robinson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca>
*   Phone: (780) 670-8626
*   Address: 7th Floor, 10065 Jasper Avenue NW, Edmonton, AB T5J 3B1

### Attachments

Download the attached documents, including the Request for Qualifications, for more information on this project.

### Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

This tender announcement is available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at [www.canadab
